QuestData.Title: Return to the Shrine
QuestData.Description: Aviana's Egg should have arrived safely back at the Shrine. You should go check on it! Choluna should know how to handle this.$B$BI'll finish the last of our business here and catch up with you later.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Choluna at the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Choluna at the Shrine of Aviana in Mount Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: $n! Is it true you led an assault against a twilight dragon?$B$BYou are truly a herald of the ancients!
